value: "Legendary Thor's Hammer, imbued with lightning magic. Deals massive thunder damage.",
"A small vial of sweet, effervescent liquid. Restores a moderate amount of HP.",
"Rare armor made from the scales of a legendary dragon. Provides excellent protection.",
"A small, radiant crystal that emits a warm, flickering flame. Used as a focus for fire magic.",
"An enchanted emblem that radiates an aura of darkness. Used for dark rituals and enchantments.",
"A hunk of meat, frozen solid. Used as a base ingredient for various dishes.",
"An ornate golden amulet, adorned with precious gems. Grants the wearer good fortune and protection.",
"A collection of ancient, dusty tomes. Contains valuable knowledge and arcane secrets.",
